section1.title: This is a Page Section
section1.column1:
Notice how page sections utilize the Content Section component to define a section of the page as well as the Content Container component to contain page content within a centered container to prevent content from spanning the entire screen width on larger screens.

Enjoy this picture of Nicolas Cage on the right. He's placed over there using the grid system.
